de.saschafeldmann.adesso.master.thesis.preprocesses.algorithm.nlp

Class NlpPreprocessingAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.saschafeldmann.adesso.master.thesis.preprocesses.algorithm.nlp.NlpPreprocessingAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreprocessingAlgorithm

    @Component
 @Scope(value="singleton")
public class NlpPreprocessingAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements PreprocessingAlgorithm
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 17.06.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    Natural language preprocessing algorithm implementation. Uses the Stanford NLP library and trained models for both the German and English languages. http://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/

    Important:

    Stanford NLP POS tagger and NER classifier models need a lot of Heap memory. I measured at least 1,2 GB for German only plus 1 GB for English. Therefore, the Java process running this application should get a maximum heap size (-Xmx) of at least 3 GB.

    Additionally, this class here should be defined as singleton and initialized in the application only once.
    The implementation must be threadsafe so that multiple users can trigger the NLP via this singleton instance.

        public LearningContent execute(LearningContent learningContent,

        Description copied from interface: PreprocessingAlgorithm
        Execute the algorith. Take the raw text stored in the given learningContent as input. Write back the outputs to the learning content returned.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        learningContent - raw learning content
        preprocessingOptions - the options
        Returns:
        the enriched learning content
        Throws:
        NlpException - if the NLP didn't work
